column1: Mablung was Rangers of Ithilien during the War of the Ring.
Mablungs family had lived in Ithilien before it was overrun by the forces of Sauron. As such
column2: he was given a place among the Rangers of Ithilien

column3: Mablung served under the Stewards second son
column4: Faramir. They were sent to intercept a troop of Southrons in March
column6: they came across Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee. While standing guard over Faramirs guest with Damrod
column7: he briefly conversed with them. Faramir
column9: went on to ambush the Haradrim.

column1: Mablung and Damrod remained the guards of the Ring-bearer during their short stay at Henneth Ann√ªn.

column2: Mablung was given command of the Rangers after the Battle of the Pelennor Fields. When the Army of the West marched on the Morannon
column3: Mablung and his troops scouted the road and discovered an ambush by Orcs and Easterlings that lay hid in Ithilien. The ambush was quickly turned.
"Faramir (chapter)" The name is from Doriathrin mab "hand"
column4: lung "heavy".His epithet was a translation of his name
